# Entry.GetTypeFromValue method

Gets an entry type from a value.

```csharp
public static EntryType GetTypeFromValue(object value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The value to get the entry type from. |

## Return Value

The entry type.

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ArgumentNullException | Thrown when the value is null. |
| ArgumentException | Throws when the value type is not supported. |
